title: Ace Ventura: Pet Detective poster fonts
content:
Hello once again.

Simple ones for you folk, I'm sure. I'm not good enough at this though. So, I humbly ask for your help on this one. The Ace Ventura poster, more specifically the business card seen prominently on the poster. Here's the image:

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131127060029im_/http:/typophile.com/files/ace_3509.jpg)

I'd like to know the font used for "Ace Ventura" or, if not an exact match, something that has similar styles for: C, V, N, U, R and A. Most specifically C and R.

Secondly, what is the handwriting style font used for the "To serve and protect..." text?

Thanks in advance :D
author: klokwerk

comments.content:
The sans caps (ACE ...) look like condensed Franklin Gothic.

The script is Brush Script.
